sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { TrendingUp, TrendingDown, DollarSign, Target, Shield, Calendar, Award, BarChart3, Activity, Zap, Sparkles, Star, Rocket, Gem, Crown, Flame } from 'lucide-react'; const PortfolioSummary = ({ dashboardData, dashboardExtraData, onLoadExtraData, loadingExtra, showExtraMetrics }) => { const isProfit = dashboardData.profitLoss >= 0; const profitLossColor = isProfit ? 'text-green-600' : 'text-red-600'; const formatCurrency = (amount) => { return new Intl.NumberFormat('en-IN', { style: 'currency', currency: 'INR', minimumFractionDigits: 0, maximumFractionDigits: 0, }).format(amount || 0); }; const formatPercentage = (percentage) => { if (percentage == null || isNaN(percentage)) { return 'N/A'; } return `${percentage >= 0 ? '+' : ''}${percentage.toFixed(2)}%`; }; // Calculate additional metrics const mainMetrics = [ { title: 'Total Invested', value: formatCurrency(dashboardData.totalInvested), icon: DollarSign, color: 'text-blue-600', bgColor: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-blue-50 via-blue-100 to-indigo-50', iconBg: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-blue-500 to-blue-600', description: 'Total amount invested across all funds', animation: 'animate-pulse', glow: 'shadow-blue-200' }, { title: 'Current Value', value: formatCurrency(dashboardData.totalValue), icon: Target, color: 'text-purple-600', bgColor: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-purple-50 via-purple-100 to-pink-50', iconBg: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-purple-500 to-purple-600', description: 'Current market value of your portfolio', animation: 'animate-bounce', glow: 'shadow-purple-200' }, { title: 'Unrealized P&L', value: formatCurrency(Math.abs(dashboardData.profitLoss)), percentage: formatPercentage(dashboardData.profitLossPercent), icon: isProfit ? TrendingUp : TrendingDown, color: profitLossColor, bgColor: isProfit ? 'bg-gradient-to-br from-green-50 via-green-100 to-emerald-50' : 'bg-gradient-to-br from-red-50 via-red-100 to-rose-50', iconBg: isProfit ? 'bg-gradient-to-br from-green-500 to-green-600' : 'bg-gradient-to-br from-red-500 to-red-600', description: 'Current unrealized profit/loss', animation: isProfit ? 'animate-pulse' : 'animate-pulse', glow: isProfit ? 'shadow-green-200' : 'shadow-red-200', specialIcon: isProfit ? Sparkles : Flame }, { title: 'Emergency Fund', value: formatCurrency(dashboardData.totalEmergencyFundValue), icon: Shield, color: 'text-yellow-600', bgColor: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-yellow-50 via-yellow-100 to-amber-50', iconBg: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-yellow-500 to-yellow-600', description: 'Value of emergency fund investments', animation: 'animate-pulse', glow: 'shadow-yellow-200' } ]; const detailedMetrics = dashboardExtraData ? [ { title: 'XIRR', value: formatPercentage(dashboardExtraData.xirr), icon: BarChart3, color: 'text-indigo-600', bgColor: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-indigo-50 via-indigo-100 to-blue-50', iconBg: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-indigo-500 to-indigo-600', description: 'Extended Internal Rate of Return', animation: 'animate-pulse', glow: 'shadow-indigo-200', specialIcon: Star }, { title: 'Realized Profit', value: formatCurrency(dashboardExtraData.totalRealizedProfit), icon: Award, color: 'text-emerald-600', bgColor: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-emerald-50 via-emerald-100 to-green-50', iconBg: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-emerald-500 to-emerald-600', description: 'Total profit from sold investments', animation: 'animate-bounce', glow: 'shadow-emerald-200', specialIcon: Crown }, { title: 'Current Year Realized', value: formatCurrency(dashboardExtraData.currentYearTotalRealizedProfit), icon: Calendar, color: 'text-orange-600', bgColor: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-orange-50 via-orange-100 to-amber-50', iconBg: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-orange-500 to-orange-600', description: 'Realized profit this financial year', animation: 'animate-pulse', glow: 'shadow-orange-200', specialIcon: Rocket }, { title: 'Long Term Gains', value: formatCurrency(dashboardExtraData.longTermGains), icon: TrendingUp, color: 'text-violet-600', bgColor: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-violet-50 via-violet-100 to-purple-50', iconBg: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-violet-500 to-violet-600', description: 'Long term capital gains from investments', animation: 'animate-pulse', glow: 'shadow-violet-200', specialIcon: Gem } ] : []; return (
{/* Main Portfolio Overview */}

Portfolio Overview

Welcome back, {dashboardData.userName}!

{/* Main Metrics Grid */}
{mainMetrics.map((metric, index) => (

{metric.title}

{metric.value}

{metric.percentage && (

{metric.percentage}

)}

{metric.description}

))}
{/* Detailed Metrics Section */}

Detailed Metrics

{showExtraMetrics ? (
{detailedMetrics.map((metric, index) => (

{metric.title}

{metric.value}

{metric.description}

))}
) : loadingExtra ? (
Loading...
{[1, 2, 3, 4].map((index) => (
))}
) : (

Advanced Analytics

Load Long Term Gains, Realized Profits, and other detailed metrics

)}
); }; export default PortfolioSummary;
